# Touch Function

Functions can be assigned to the following flick gestures in much the same way as function buttons (ðŸ“– 322):

- Flick up: **T-Fn1**
- Flick left: **T-Fn2**
- Flick right: **T-Fn3**
- Flick down: **T-Fn4**

!Touch Function Gestures

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**
> - In some cases, touch-function flick gestures display a menu; tap to select the desired option.
> - Touch-function gestures are disabled by default. To enable touch-function gestures, select **ON** for **ðŸ”§ BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING > T-Fn TOUCH FUNCTION**.
